## Installation

You can install the released version of sgs from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("sgs")
```
**Note:** To use only the OSGB36/ETRS89 transformations (OSTN15) there is no
need to install the package's dependencies.


And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("litos81/sgs")
```
